event.description: Willy Taveras grounds out, third baseman Emilio Bonifacio to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Chris Dickerson reaches on a fielding error by shortstop Hanley Ramirez.
Joey Votto singles on a line drive to right fielder Cody Ross. Chris Dickerson to 3rd.
Brandon Phillips called out on strikes.
Jay Bruce flies out to center fielder Cameron Maybin.
Ramon Hernandez grounds out, first baseman Jorge Cantu to pitcher Josh Johnson.
Adam Rosales singles on a ground ball to right fielder Cody Ross.
Alex Gonzalez flies out to right fielder Cody Ross.
Aaron Harang strikes out swinging.

Brandon Phillips lines out to shortstop Hanley Ramirez.
Defensive Substitution: Brett Carroll replaces left fielder Jeremy Hermida, batting 6th, playing left field.

Ramon Hernandez out on a sacrifice bunt to first baseman Jorge Cantu. Jay Bruce to 2nd.

Ronny Paulino remains in the game as the catcher.

Jorge Cantu grounds into a force out, first baseman Joey Votto to shortstop Paul Janish. Ronny Paulino scores. Hanley Ramirez out at 2nd. Jorge Cantu advances to 1st, on a throwing error by shortstop Paul Janish.
